channel.title: About the Reviews and Ratings category
channel.description: Create a new topic here to talk about an experience you've had in the Marketplace. The more we talk about how the marketplace is working, the better it will be for everyone. Also see [How to participate in the OGM Marketplace](https://forum.openglobalmind.com/t/how-to-participate-in-the-ogm-marketplace/348).
